metadata.description: Macnversion's fork of Anthropic example skills

plugins.name: algorithmic-art
plugins.description: Creating algorithmic art using p5.js with seeded randomness and interactive parameter exploration.

plugins.name: brand-guidelines
plugins.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact.

plugins.name: canvas-design
plugins.description: Create beautiful visual art in .png and .pdf documents using design philosophy.

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality.

plugins.name: slack-gif-creator
plugins.description: Knowledge and utilities for creating animated GIFs optimized for Slack.

plugins.name: theme-factory
plugins.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts.

plugins.name: docx
plugins.description: Comprehensive document creation, editing, and analysis for .docx files.

plugins.name: pdf
plugins.description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text, creating, merging, and handling forms.

plugins.name: pptx
plugins.description: Presentation creation, editing, and analysis for .pptx files.

plugins.name: xlsx
plugins.description: Comprehensive spreadsheet creation, editing, and analysis for .xlsx files.

plugins.name: doc-coauthoring
plugins.description: Guide users through a structured workflow for co-authoring documentation.

plugins.name: internal-comms
plugins.description: Resources for writing internal communications like status reports and updates.

plugins.name: mcp-builder
plugins.description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP servers in Python or TypeScript.

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Guide for creating effective skills that extend Claude's capabilities.

plugins.name: web-artifacts-builder
plugins.description: Tools for creating multi-component HTML artifacts using React, Tailwind, shadcn/ui.

plugins.name: webapp-testing
plugins.description: Toolkit for interacting with and testing local web applications using Playwright.
